Package Strategy.Algorithms

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • Strategy.Algorithms.Node
  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the node in the decision tree which is the part of MCTS algorithm.

    The Node contains six methods to get or set state, parent or child array for the node.

    The Node contains one method that chooses random child node.

    The Node contains one method that chooses child node with maximum score.

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Denis Krylov
    See Also:
    Tree, State, MonteCarloTreeSearch

      • getChildWithMaxScore

        public Node getChildWithMaxScore()
                          throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Select the child node with maximum score. The more score is the more probability that the move will help to win.
        Returns:
        node in the child array with the highest score
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException
